content: Scientifically speaking, shooting stars are just celestial phenomena — there's no data to support the idea that they affect whether our wishes come true...
info: 看流星雨-墨尔斯闲聊_主流程文本3

content: But I still made a wish. I wanted to send my blessings your way — everyone's way. {A挠头}<style=SizeSmall>Sometimes, unscientific things just... feel right.</style>
info: 看流星雨-墨尔斯闲聊_主流程文本3

content: {A思考}<style=SizeSmall>Magnetic interference peaks from the meteors here hit...</style> I can't believe I'm getting such rare data. Sometimes, I think I might be dreaming...
info: 看流星雨-墨尔斯闲聊_主流程文本3

content: I'll probably need to give myself a good pinch with the shellfish tongs when I get back...
info: 看流星雨-墨尔斯闲聊_主流程文本3

content: Toss a starfish into zero-gravity? Watch it float around and— BAM! Shooting star!

content: Came up with this dad joke while watching the shooting stars. Pretty funny, right? {A疑惑}<style=SizeSmall>...Huh? Crickets?</style>
